root.name: Iron Man: Aerial Assault
root.description: ContorlsIron Man: Aerial Assault uses the iPhone's and iPod Touch's inbuilt accelerometer to control the main hero of the game: Iron Man. This is often enhanced by swift changes made through the touch screen. ConceptIron Man: Aerial Assault incorporates both shooting elements and flight simulator elements, to deliver exciting air battles. Various of Iron Mans weapons are featured in the game such as repulsor blasts, lasers, misses as well as the unibeam.
